JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Multi-brand mekaniker søkes til Køge / mechanic for a multi-brand service
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you searching for a rewarding job offering excellent pay, a great work-life balance, job security, and opportunities for growth? On behalf of our client in Køge, WiiSDA is hiring a mechanic for a multi-brand service.  

Job responsibilities: 

Your responsibilities will focus on delivering high-quality maintenance and repair services, always ensuring professionalism and dependability. 

Duties: 

  • General mechanical repairs 

  • Service and maintenance 

  • Basic computer diagnostics 

 

About the area: 

  • Convenient location, close to Copenhagen 

  • Active lifestyle 

  • Clean water, fresh air – family friendly! 

  •  

Personal characteristics: 

  • Long-term perspective (2+ years) 

  • Independent worker and a good team player 

  • Open to learning new technology 

  • Focused on quality and productivity 

 

Needed qualifications: 

  • Experience working in a multi-brand service  

  • Mechanics diploma and minimum 3 years of up-to-date experience  

  • Valid driving license: B 

  • Communicative knowledge of English is necessary 

 

We offer: 

  • Full-time, permanent contracts 

  • Competitive Salary & Benefits 

  • Great work-life balance  

  • Housing assistance  

  • Work permit/visa, tax registration, accident insurance 

  • Confidentiality – We never contact your current employer 

 

Apply and submit your CV! 

WiiSDA offers exciting career opportunities for skilled professionals in the automotive industry. Our goal is to attract motivated, dedicated, and knowledgeable individuals from around the globe, showcasing the benefits of working and living in Denmark. 

About us 

We are family-owned and operated – with a mission to create life-changing opportunities for automotive professionals. WiiSDA was founded in 2008 in Norway and became the first – and only – recruitment company specialising in the automotive market. In 2024 we opened our first Danish office. We improve the lives and futures of not only our candidates, but their families too.  

For both EU and non-EU candidates, we offer a seamless and efficient recruitment process that makes it easy for potential candidates to apply, find their ideal job and move to Denamrk. 

Please read the employment requirements before applying for the job READ HERE >
